configuration.name: widget_04368379282146444
configuration.stem: Using the data from your research, what have you learned about past monsoon seasons in the Southwest? Have there been changes to monsoon seasons over time? Describe any historical data related to the monsoon season.
configuration.teacherAnswer: Answers should include that although precipitation amounts vary year to year, there has not been a decreasing or increasing trend in the past 100 years.
